membership:

goal:
NGI S.p.A was established in 1999 and started to deploy the Eolo network in 2007. Nowadays, Eolo is one of the most extended fixed wireless broadband (FWB) networks in the world. Our network is fully independent from the Italian incumbent and covers more than 4.700 municipalities within 13 Italian regions.
The speed and quality of service supplied by Eolo are strictly comparable to those typical of an ultra-broadband access. Today EOLO provides a connectivity of 30 Mbps to the households and of 1 Gbps to the business customers. Starting from 1 April 2016, NGI spa changed his name in EOLO spa.
interests: Communication, Competition, Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives: Public Consultations issued by the Berec and the European Commission on TLC market
